original_title: Mannheim Steamroller: A Fresh Aire Christmas
overview: A Fresh Aire Christmas Video  Composed and Produced by Chip Davis  Featuring:  "Little Drummer Boy" from A Fresh Aire Christmas, Directed by Skip Engle  "Bring a Torch Jennette Isabella" from Mannheim Steamroller Christmas  "Silent Night" from Mannheim Steamroller Christmas  "Deck the Halls" from Mannheim Steamroller Christmas
title: Mannheim Steamroller: A Fresh Aire Christmas
